QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: LandingDistance
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Distance between landing and loiter points.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: LandingHeading
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Heading from loiter point to land point.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: LoiterAltitude
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Aircraft will proceed to the loiter point and loiter downwards until it reaches this approach altitude. Once altitude is reached the aircraft will fly to land point at current altitude.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: LandingAltitude
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Altitude for landing point on ground.
